InputOutput

Class AbstractImageSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • InputOutput.AbstractImageSource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilestreamSource, LivestreamSource, OpenIGTImageSource

    public abstract class AbstractImageSource
extends java.lang.Object
    builds an interface to other teams and enables to get a Matrix, establishes a connection to the device and disconnects the connection
    Author:
    team3
